src:
PSJ Liga 1 doirasida so‘nggi 10 yillikdagi eng yomon natijasini qayd etdi

02 Nov 2019, 20:47

Futbol bo‘yicha Fransiya chempionati 12-turida PSJ safarda “Dijon”ga 1:2 hisobida mag‘lub bo‘ldi.


Foto: Twitter

Opta xabariga ko‘ra, PSJ 2019-yil hisobidan Liga 1 doirasidagi 8-mag‘lubiyatini qabul qildi. Bu PSJning so‘nggi 10 yillikdagi eng yomon ko‘rsatkichiga aylandi.

Mavzuga doir: “Manchester Yunayted” so‘nggi 33 yillikdagi eng yomon natijasini qayd etdi

 PSJ mag‘lubiyatga qaramay 12 ta o‘yindan so‘ng 27 ochko bilan musobaqa jadvalida peshqadam bo‘lib turibdi.
text:
PSG has recorded the worst result in the league 1 in the last 10 years

02 Nov 2019, 20:47

In the 12th round of the French Football League, PSG lost to Dijon 1-1 in the away leg.


Photo: Twitter

According to Opta, PSG will be eligible for the 2019 defeat in League One. It was one of the worst PSGs of the last 10 years.

On the subject: Manchester United recorded the worst result of the last 33 years

Despite the defeat, PSG is still the leader in the table with 27 points after 12 games.
